                       , o_rt_lgp   OUT lm_load_groups%ROWTYPE )
RETURN BOOLEAN
;

RETURN BOOLEAN

                               , o_rt_lgp  OUT lm_load_groups%ROWTYPE )
RETURN BOOLEAN
;

;

;

package body lm_lgp_tapi_pck
is




function lgp_select_row( i_lgp_id   in  lm_load_groups.id%type
                       , o_rt_lgp   out lm_load_groups%rowtype )
return boolean
is
   con_proc  constant     varchar2(61) := g_con_pack || '.lgp_select_row';
   l_found                boolean      := false;
begin
   declare
      cursor c_lgp ( i_lgp_id   in  lm_load_groups.id%type )
      is 
           select *
             from lm_load_groups lgp
            where lgp.id = i_lgp_id ;
   begin                                                         
      viu_module.enter_module( i_module => con_proc );

      begin
         open c_lgp( i_lgp_id => i_lgp_id );
         fetch c_lgp into o_rt_lgp;
         l_found := c_lgp%found;
         close c_lgp;
      end;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc 
                             , i_debug_info => case l_found when true then 'found' else 'notfound' end );

      return l_found;

   exception
      when others
      then
         if c_lgp%isopen
         then
            close c_lgp;
         end if;

         viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                                , i_debug_info => sqlerrm );

         viu_info.raise_info( i_calling_procedure => con_proc );
   end;                                                          
end lgp_select_row;

return boolean
is
   con_proc  constant     varchar2(61) := g_con_pack || '.lgp_select_row_uk1';
   l_found                boolean      := false;
begin
   declare
      cursor c_lgp ( i_lgp_name   in  lm_load_groups.name%type )
      is
         select *
           from lm_load_groups lgp
          where lgp.name = i_lgp_name ;
   begin                                                         
      viu_module.enter_module( i_module => con_proc );

      begin
         open c_lgp(i_lgp_name => i_lgp_name);
         fetch c_lgp into o_rt_lgp;
         l_found := c_lgp%found;
         close c_lgp;
      end;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                             , i_debug_info => case l_found when true then 'found' else 'notfound' end );

      return l_found;

   exception
   when others
    then
      if c_lgp%isopen
      then
         close c_lgp;
      end if;
      viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                             , i_debug_info => sqlerrm );

      viu_info.raise_info( i_calling_procedure => con_proc );
   end;                                                          
end lgp_select_row_uk1;

function lgp_select_row_upd( i_lgp_id   in  lm_load_groups.id%type
                           , o_rt_lgp   out lm_load_groups%rowtype )
return boolean
is
   con_proc  constant     varchar2(61) := g_con_pack || '.lgp_select_row_upd';
   l_found                boolean      := false;

   cursor c_lgp ( i_lgp_id   in  lm_load_groups.id%type )
   is
           select *
             from lm_load_groups lgp
            where lgp.id = i_lgp_id 
         for update;
begin
   viu_module.enter_module( i_module => con_proc );

   
   open c_lgp( i_lgp_id => i_lgp_id );
   fetch c_lgp into o_rt_lgp;
   l_found := c_lgp%found;
   close c_lgp;

   viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                          , i_debug_info => case l_found when true then 'found' else 'notfound' end );

   return l_found;

exception
   when others
   then
      if c_lgp%isopen
      then
         close c_lgp;
      end if;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                             , i_debug_info => sqlerrm );

      viu_info.raise_info( i_calling_procedure => con_proc );

end lgp_select_row_upd;

function lgp_select_row_upd_uk1( i_lgp_name   in  lm_load_groups.name%type
                               , o_rt_lgp  out lm_load_groups%rowtype )
return boolean
is
   con_proc  constant     varchar2(61) := g_con_pack || '.lgp_select_row_upd_uk1';
   l_found                boolean      := false;
begin
   begin
      viu_module.enter_module( i_module => con_proc );

      
      l_found := lgp_select_row_uk1( i_lgp_name   =>  i_lgp_name
                                   , o_rt_lgp => o_rt_lgp );
      if l_found
      then
         
         l_found := lgp_select_row_upd( i_lgp_id => o_rt_lgp.id
                                      , o_rt_lgp => o_rt_lgp );
      end if;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                             , i_debug_info => case l_found when true then 'found' else 'notfound' end );

      return l_found;

   exception
      when others
      then
        viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                               , i_debug_info => sqlerrm);

        viu_info.raise_info(i_calling_procedure => con_proc);
   end;
end lgp_select_row_upd_uk1;

procedure lgp_lock_row( i_lgp_id   in  lm_load_groups.id%type )
is
   con_proc  constant     varchar2(61) := g_con_pack || '.lgp_lock_row';
begin
  declare
     cursor c_lgp ( i_lgp_id   in  lm_load_groups.id%type )
     is
             select ''
               from lm_load_groups lgp
              where lgp.id = i_lgp_id 
         for update;

   begin                                                         
      viu_module.enter_module(i_module => con_proc);

      begin
         
         if i_lgp_id is not null
         then
            begin
                
                lgp_lock_row_nowait( i_lgp_id => i_lgp_id );
            exception
               when viu_constant.exc_lockfailed
               then
                  
                  g_lock_conflicts := g_lock_conflicts + 1;

                  
                  viu_info.reset_package_variables;

                  
                  open c_lgp( i_lgp_id => i_lgp_id );
                  close c_lgp;
               end;
         end if;
      end;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module => con_proc );

   exception
      when others
      then
         if c_lgp%isopen
         then
            close c_lgp;
         end if;

         viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                                , i_debug_info => sqlerrm );

         viu_info.raise_info(i_calling_procedure => con_proc );
   end;                                                          
end lgp_lock_row;

procedure lgp_lock_row_nowait( i_lgp_id   in  lm_load_groups.id%type )
is
   con_proc  constant     varchar2(61) := g_con_pack || '.lgp_lock_row_nowait';
begin
   declare
      cursor c_lgp ( i_lgp_id   in  lm_load_groups.id%type )
      is
              select ''
                from lm_load_groups lgp
               where lgp.id = i_lgp_id 
          for update nowait;

   begin                                                         
      viu_module.enter_module(i_module => con_proc);

      begin

         
         if i_lgp_id is not null
         then
            
            open c_lgp( i_lgp_id => i_lgp_id );

            close c_lgp;
         end if;
      end;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module => con_proc );

   exception
      when others
      then
        if c_lgp%isopen
        then
           close c_lgp;
        end if;

        viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                               , i_debug_info => sqlerrm );

        viu_info.raise_info( i_ifo_nr            => viu_constant.c_ifo_lockfailed
                           , i_calling_procedure => con_proc
                           , i_severity          => viu_info.c_severity_error
                           , i_info_arguments    => g_con_table_name
                           , i_additional_data   =>   'ID = "'||i_lgp_id||'"' );
   end;                                                          
end lgp_lock_row_nowait;


end lm_lgp_tapi_pck;
